properties.areaDesc: Crittenden, AR; Poinsett, AR; St. Francis, AR; Cross, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 3:46AM CST until January 11 at 5:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas...
Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas...
Northwestern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas...
Cross County in eastern Arkansas...

* Until 545 AM CST.

* At 345 AM CST, heavy rainfall has resulted in minor flooding from
near Forrest City, to Wynne. Some roads will see significant
ponding of water, especially in urban and other poor drainage
areas. Rainfall amounts up to 2 inches have already fallen in the
advisory area.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Forrest City, Wynne, Trumann, Marked Tree, Earle, Harrisburg,
Lepanto, Parkin, Madison, Tyronza, Palestine, Village Creek State
Park, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Colt, Widener, Jennette, Vanndale,
Greenfield and New Home.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying
spots.
